By accessing and browsing TEVA Website, you accept, without limitation or qualification, the terms and conditions of use of the Website and acknowledge that any other agreements between you and TEVA concerning TEVA Website are superseded to the extent they conflict with the Legal Notice.  Your use of or linking to any content on TEVA Website, except as provided in this Legal Notice, is strictly prohibited. This Legal Notice was last updated on 24/06/2014. TEVA may change this Legal Notice at any time and at its sole discretion. All modifications to this Legal Notice will be effective immediately upon our posting of the modifications on TEVA Website. Please review the Legal Notice each time you visit TEVA Website. By using TEVA Website, it means you accept the most recent version of this Legal Notice.

If you get any side effects, talk to your doctor, pharmacist or nurse. This includes any possible side effects not listed in the package leaflet. You can also report side effects directly via the Yellow Card Scheme at www.mhra.gov.uk/yellowcard. By reporting side effects you can help provide more information on the safety of this medicine. Adverse events should also be reported to Teva UK Limited on 0207 540 7117 or report it online.
